text: Together we can change the world, just one random act of kindness at a time.
author: Ron Hall

text: Goals transform a random walk into a chase
author: Mihaly Csikzentmihalyi

text: Not how long, but how well you lived is the main thing
author: Seneca

text: I love those who can smile in trouble.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans
author: John Lennon

text: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
author: Andre Gide

text: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive
author: Elbert Hubbard

text: Do stuff. Be clenched, curious. Not waiting for inspiration’s shove or society’s kiss on your forehead. Pay attention. It’s all about paying attention. Attention is vitality. It connects you with others. It makes you eager. Stay eager.
author: Susan Sontag

text: I tell you, in this world being a little crazy helps to keep you sane.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
